name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (ShinPJDev)
description:
This is a short game for the GameDev.TV Game Jam. May not be much but hopefully there is some enjoyment!

WASD keys are used to move up, down, left and right. Space bar is used to jump. Mouse is use to jump and the left mouse button allows you to grab an object (more so for fun really).
